What kind of link?
`ln -s original.file newlink.file`
@Deliriumgoddess6: shortcut key combination or registering on launcher?

Simple shortkey combination can be easily produced by registering a new key combination on settings -> keyboard.
Put the executable scripts as a corresponding shortkey.
For example the script can be like:

    firefox myFrontPage.html;

If the registered key combination is like `super-alt-t`, pressing `super-alt-t` will open `myFrontPage.html` on firefox.
